title: (x) 'Building Control Inc.' outline sans - Digital Sans {Yves}
content:
Hello again...need some more help IDing a font:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013110705im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/dynamic_6450.jpg)

Apologies for the poor quality. Any and all help is, as always, appreciated!

author: iskippy227

comments.content: That appears to be it. Thanks!
